newsitem.title: USA: K-III Communications Corp notes count ends.
newsitem.headline: K-III Communications Corp notes count ends.

text.p: K-III Communications Corp said Friday its exchange agent had completed the final count of certificates representing 8-1/2 percent Senior Notes due 2006.
K-III Communications said The Bank of New York had also completed the count of $10 Series C Exchangeable Preferred Stock tendered during its exchange offers made between July 24 and August 21.

It said the final count showed that $300 million in aggregate principal amount of the senior notes, representing 100 percent of the notes outstanding, and 2.0 million Series C shares, representing 100 percent of the shares outstanding, had been validly tendered and not withdrawn.
The senior notes and the shares will be exchanged for an equal number of a new series of 8-1/2 percent senior notes due 2006 and shares of $10 Series D Exchangeable Preferred Stock, it added.
